title: Reposition image and microphone buttons to left of chat input with aligned heights

requirements.summary: Move the image upload button and microphone button to the left side of the text input field in the MessageInput component
acceptanceCriteria: Image button appears on the far left
Microphone button appears between image button and text input
Text input field appears on the right side of both buttons

file_operations.description: Restructure the MessageInput component's button layout to position the image upload button and microphone button on the left side of the text input field. Update the flex layout so that buttons appear in the order: image button (far left), microphone button (center-left), text input (right). Preserve all existing functionality including voice recording state, image upload handlers, Giphy integration, and URL auto-detection features.

requirements.summary: Ensure the text input field, image button, and microphone button all have matching heights and are perfectly aligned vertically in the MessageInput component
acceptanceCriteria: All three elements (image button, microphone button, text input) have identical heights
Elements are perfectly aligned vertically with no misalignment
Layout maintains consistent spacing between elements

file_operations.description: Apply consistent height styling to the image button, microphone button, and text input field to ensure they all have identical heights. Use Tailwind CSS utility classes or inline styles to enforce uniform height (e.g., h-12 or h-10) across all three elements. Ensure vertical alignment using flex items-center on the parent container. Add consistent spacing (e.g., gap-2) between elements to maintain visual harmony. Verify that button padding and text input padding are adjusted to match the unified height while preserving click/tap target sizes.
